colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHOG 'DI NI YUL MI RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHIN TU NYAMS NAS NYAM THAG LA, BYAMS PA'I SEMS KYIS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE THA SHAL SMYON PA'I SPYOD YUL CAN SU MA TI KARMA MING CAN GYIS, SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GA-YANG KHUG SOGS LA GZHI BYAS @008A , ,NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG NA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA CHAGS SO, ,BDAG LA SGRIB PAR MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZOD DU GSOL , LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DGE 'DIS 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL DANG BRAL NAS MYUR DU DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYE BA'I RGYUR CIG , ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
